PassiveDesc.Name: Speed
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +1. Gain a Speed die since the third Scene. Gain an additional one if there's an enemy whose Emotion Level is 4 or higher. Does not gain Speed dice from Emotion Level bonuses.

PassiveDesc.Name: Perfect Extraction--Prime Soul
PassiveDesc.Desc: The Deck Limit increase to 18. A deck with 9 or more Pages will not be added with additional Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Borrowed Embers
PassiveDesc.Desc: While alive, the first Offensive die allies play each engagement inflicts 2 Burn on hit. After death, allies are inflicted with 1 Burn when hit.

PassiveDesc.Name: Supraheat
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there is total 30 stacks Burn in the field at the start of Scene, Dice gain +1 Power and inflict +25% Damage and Stagger Damage for the duration of that Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Restraints
PassiveDesc.Desc: If achieve 6 clash win agaisnt same enemy in one Scene, inflict 1 'Restraint' at the end of the Scene. On hit against a target with 3 or more stacks of 'Restraint', Immobilize them for the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Prognosis
PassiveDesc.Desc: While alive, allies gain the effect of 'Puffy Brume'. Upon death, allies are inflicted with 10 Smoke and lose the effect of 'Puffy Brume'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fumigating Smoke
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every Scene, all allies gain Smoke equal to half the amount of Smoke this character has.

PassiveDesc.Name: Foggy Matrix
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 'Smoke', Reduce incoming Damage by (5 * Smoke)%

PassiveDesc.Name: Knight in Shark Fins
PassiveDesc.Desc: While alive, all other allies gain 2 Protection and Stagger Protection. 若Upon death, all allies are inflicted with 5 Fragile next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Add Salt to Injury
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the target has 5 or more Bleed, Inflicts 1 Fragile on hit. (Max. 3)

PassiveDesc.Name: Dermal Regeneration
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character was not hit by any attacks for a Scene, recover 15 HP and gain 1 Strength Endurance.

PassiveDesc.Name: Martial Song of the Battlefield
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, give a random ally one stack of status effect. (Strength, Endurance, or Haste) for each Light this character has. Upon death: all enemies gain 3 Strength, Endurance, and Haste next scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Beklemmt Resolve
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cost of all pages are reduced by 2. Can only recover 1 Light at the start of each Scene. Loses all Light when Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Showtime~
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, all enemies take Stagger damage euqal to 3-6% of Max Stagger Resist. Upon death, all enemies fully restore Stagger Resist, and all status ailments on them are halved.

PassiveDesc.Name: I Can Shrug That Off!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot lose more than 50% of Max HP in a single Scene. Whenever an ally dies, takes 16 Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Intermission
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain a copy of "Intermission Time~", making self disappearing from Battlefield for 2 Scene. Recover all Lights and draw 6 Pages when returned. If staggered when disappearance then reappear immediately.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fusion with Red String
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there is allied and alive Puppeteer presnet, be able to use "Strangle with Red String". On play to force Puppeteer to use "Red String Conjoins" attacking enemies, make them gain 2 "Red String" next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Amalgamation
PassiveDesc.Desc: If spawned by the effects of 'Red Strings', Max HP increases by hp lost from character that was conjoined, and gains some passive abilities of the enemies conjoined. At the start of each Scene, draw 2 Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fierce Sandstorm
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, all enemies take damage equal to 3-6% Max HP. After death, all enemies deal +3 damage with attacks for the rest of the Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Burning Resolve to Fight On
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there are no other allies present at the end of the Scene, gain 1 Strength and Endurance, and gain 2 Speed dice for the rest of the Act. At the start of each Scene, draw 2 Page and recover 2 Light.

PassiveDesc.Name: Lord and Clown
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there is allied and alive 8 O'clock Circus presnet, reduce incoming Stagger Damage by 30%.

PassiveDesc.Name: Entangled Strings
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a die each ally plays rolls the minimum value, reroll it. Activates once per die. At the start of the Scene, all enemies are inflicted with 1-3 Bind. After death, all enemies gain 1-3 Haste at the start of each Scene, and all of their dice gain +1 Power for the rest of the Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sandstorm Entanglement
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there is allied and alive L’heure du Loup presnet, successful hits will inflict 1 Bleed in the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unbound Flesh
PassiveDesc.Desc: Achieve a successful kill will randomly summon an uncontrollable Puppet, Nimble Puppet or Weighty Puppet

PassiveDesc.Name: Blood is Fuel
PassiveDesc.Desc: All allies recover 2 health after a successful hit. On Death, all allies lose 50% Max HP

PassiveDesc.Name: Vampiric Rampage
PassiveDesc.Desc: For each 40 health recoverd in a single Act, Dice gain +1 power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unwielding Will
PassiveDesc.Desc: Revive in the next Scene after first death. Revived body only has passive Speedy and stats of 100/50 with 2-6 speed dice.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unjust Exploitation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Can use Pages that inflict "Unjust Contract" to enemies. On Death, exhaust all Pages in hands of all allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Stygian Shade
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain a copy of "Hex: Shade Eclipse", spawns a Shade that copy target's Combat Pages and passive.

PassiveDesc.Name: Without Light
PassiveDesc.Desc: If Yesterday's Promise is not present at the end of the Scene, dies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Powerful Shadow
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice Power +1. Can use one of the Shade's Combat Page every Scene.
